# ownCloud

Open-source platform for self-hosted file synchronization and sharing (predecessor of Nextcloud).

Gives you your own cloud storage without dependence on Big Tech.

See also → [Nextcloud](/EN/concepts/nextcloud) · [Data sovereignty](/EN/concepts/data-sovereignty) · [Thesis 13](/EN/theses/thesis-13) · [owncloud.com](https://owncloud.com/)
